title: nannu brOva rAdA
sahitya:
nannu brOva rAdA vEgamE nIvu


anupallavi

  vinu nA moralanu nE nI dAsuDugadA


caraNam 1    kOrina varamiccE deivamu nIvEgAdA kAruNya mUrti kaumArI gaurI 
sharaNAgata jana rakSakI shankarI sarasa mrdu bhASiNi rAjarAjEshvarI
    caraNam 2    abhaya dAnamiccE deivamu nIvEgadA abhirAma guNAmayi akhilANDEshvari 
Ashrita jana tApa hAriNi purANI Ananda rUpiNi alikula vENI
    caraNam 3    kAmita phalamiccE deivamu nIvEgadA pAmara pAlinI bhavabhaya bhanjanI 
sOmashEkhara priya bhAminI ranjanI shyAmakrSNa sOdari pArvatI bhavAnI
